title: This is a Test Article
sub: Great article made to test some stuff
author: Dingus McDingus
content:
Feel free to use this free online HTML editor to generate HTML code for your own website, blog, email newsletter, etc.

To get started:

  • Delete this content and enter your own content
  • To view the source code, simply select the Tools > Source menu option above
  • Rinse and repeat as required
  • Copy and paste the source code into your own website, blog, email newsletter, etc

Go ahead - try it!
